Altar Boy Prayer for Catholic Priest Vocations Note Card

Top 5! Altar Boy Prayer for Catholic Priest Vocations Note Card – Note Cards This item is trending! Altar Boy Prayer for Catholic Priest Vocations Note Card It’s a great choice Altar Boy Prayer for Catholic Priest Vocations Note Card It’s in stock and ready to ship.Encouraging and nurturing future priests begins with supporting the young men who serve at the altar. This prayer card features a reverent image of a priest offering the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass, assisted by an altar boy. On the back, the name of each altar server is beautifully personalized, accompanied by a prayer by St. John Berchmans, the patron saint of altar servers. These cards invite parishioners to unite in prayer for these young men, fostering their spiritual growth and helping them discern their vocation. By distributing these prayer cards, your parish can build a community dedicated to praying for and supporting these future shepherds of the Church. Ideal for any parish looking to encourage and nurture vocations. Price:$2.16

Top 5! Altar Boy Prayer for Catholic Priest Vocations Note Card ($2.16)
